ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Pre_defined_activity_relationship_types is a constant list of the Pre_defined_activity_relationship_types:
'alternative': The application object defines a relationship where the
identified by the
may be used alternatively instead of the
identified by the ;
'decomposition': The application object defines a relationship where the
identified by the
is one of potentially more sub-activities into which the
identified by the is broken down;
'derivation': The application object defines a relationship where the the
identified by the
is derived from the
identified by the ;
An
that is controlled by a
with work order type 'manufacturing release' may be derived from (is based on) another
controlled by another
with work order type 'design release'.
'exclusiveness': The application object defines a relationship where the
identified by the
and the
identified by the
shall not have any overlap in time of execution;
'precedence': The application object defines a relationship where the
identified by the
has higher priority than the
identified by the ;
'sequence': The application object defines a relationship where the
identified by the
shall be completed before the
identified by the
starts;
'simultaneity': The application object defines a relationship that establishes that both the
identified by the
and
identified by the
are considered as occurring during the same time period or shall be performed together in order to ensure consistency and enhance efficiency.
The criteria for 'simultaneity' and in particular the allowed delay between two
objects declared simultaneous, are user-dependent.

that specifies the Externally_defined_activity_relationship as its .

The
shall not have a value from the .
